documents.document: There are certainly not so many men of large fortune in the world, as there are pretty women to deserve them. ~Jane Austen
To bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one’s own mind. ~Gautama Buddha
Most disappointments are created by unrealistic expectations we have. By rejecting these expectations life becomes more agreeable.
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence. ~Vince Lombardi
Happiness comes of the capacity to feel deeply, to enjoy simply, to think freely, to be needed. ~Storm Jameson
The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something. ~Muhamed Iqbal
You can’t do anything about the length of your life, but you can do something about its width and depth. ~Evan Esar
Avoid negative people at all costs. They are the greatest destroyers of self confidence and self-esteem. ~Brian Tracy
Don’t try to be what you think you should be. Just be who you are. ~Jerry Corstens
Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
Pray as if it’s up to God, work as if it’s up to you.
The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources. ~Albert Einstein
Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing it is not fish they are after. ~Henry David Thoreau
It’s important to learn to laugh at ourselves, don’t take life too seriously. ~Geri Halliwell
In an autobiography, one cannot avoid writing ‘often’ where truth would require that ‘once’ be written. ~Franz Kafka
In this life we cannot always do great things. But we can do small things with great love. ~Mother Teresa
Missing someone and not being able to see them is the worst feeling ever.
The best and most beautiful things in life cannot be seen, not touched, but are felt in the heart. ~Helen Keller
A daughter is one of the most beautiful gifts this world has to give. ~Laurel Atherton
What we are is God’s gift to us. What we become is our gift to God. ~Eleanor Powell
God can turn around any situation.
Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you’ll start having positive results.
Never accept yourself as a finished product. As long as you have breath in your lungs, expand yourself. ~BL Bates
Do not be afraid of a small beginning, great things come afterwards. ~Vivekananda
We are born with only two fears: fear of falling and fear of loud noise. All the rest is learned. ~Richard Bandler
When one door is closed, don’t you know that many more are open. ~Bob Marley
Smile for what you have, rather than cry for what you don’t.
You will never change your life until you change something you do daily. ~John C Maxwell
To live for a time close to great minds is the best kind of education. ~John Buchan
Discoveries are often made by not following instructions, by going off the main road, by trying the untried. ~Frank Tyger
Dancing: the vertical expression of a horizontal desire. ~Robert Frost
Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as successful.
An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind. ~Mahatma Gandhi
Those who are at war with others are not at peace with themselves. ~William Hazlitt
Peace is not a relationship of nations. It is a condition of mind brought about by a serenity of soul. ~Jawaharlal Nehru
The life of inner peace, being harmonious and without stress, is the easiest type of existence. ~Norman Vincent Peale
In sports you don’t get what you wish for, you get what you work for.
Minds are like parachutes - they only function when open. ~Thomas Dewar
The secret of happiness is to count your blessings while others are adding up their troubles.
Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character. ~Albert Einstein
Be so busy loving your life that you have no time for hate, regret or fear.
Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit. ~Conrad Hilton
If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem. ~Richard Bach
The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who can’t read them. ~Mark Twain
Mediocrity will always try to drag excellence down to its level. Don’t trade your superiority for their inferiority.
Be silent or let thy words be worth more than silence. ~Pythagoras
Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow. ~Doug Firebaugh
It is not joy that makes us grateful. It is gratitude that makes us joyful. ~David Rast
Opportunity follows struggle. It follows effort. It follows hard work. It doesn’t come before.
People of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things. ~Leonardo Da Vinci
Ninety-nine percent of the failures comes from people who have the habit of making excuses. ~George W. Carve
When you’re down to nothing, God is up to something. The faithful see the invisible, believe the incredible and then receive the impossible.

The basic foundation of humanity is compassion and love. This is why, if even a few individuals simply try to create mental peace and happiness within themselves and act responsibly and kind-heartedly towards others, they will have a positive influence in their community. ~DL
Everyone wants happiness. No one wants pain. But you can’t have a rainbow, without a little rain.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. ~Nelson Mandela
When something bad happens you have three choices. You can either let it define you, let it destroy you, or you can let it strengthen you.
If you’re looking for things to change on the outside, it’s time to change things on the inside. What you want to see, you have to be! ~Louis Martin Jr
When you realize your own insecurity, and you embrace it, it’s such an incredible self-realization, and it’s such an incredible journey. ~Sue Bryce
The key is not to prioritize your schedule, but to schedule your priorities. ~Stephen Covey
Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes. ~Zig Ziglar
To be free is not merely to cast off one’s chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others. ~Nelson Mandela
I don’t know what effect these men will have upon the enemy, but, by God, they terrify me. ~Duke of Wellington
The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand. ~Vince Lombardi
You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. ~Jim Rohn
Millions long for immortality who don’t know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon. ~Susan Ertz
It’s not what you look at that matters, it’s what you see. ~David Henry Thoreau
If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly our whole life would change. ~Buddha
All those who are unhappy in the world are so as a result of their desire for the own unhappiness. ~Shantideva
We are not human beings having a spiritual experience; we are spiritual beings having a human experience. ~Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it. ~Paulo Coelho
Only bad writers think that their work is really good. ~Anne Enright
Scared is what you’re feeling. Brave is what you’re doing. ~Emma Donoghue
To see what is right and not to do it, is want of courage. ~Confucius
In the process of letting go you will lose many thing from the past, but you will find yourself. ~Deepak Chopra
If we do not plant knowledge when young, it will give us no shade when we are old. ~Lord Chesterfield
I know where I’m going and I know the truth, and I don’t have to be what you want me to be. I’m free to be what I want. ~Muhammad Ali
Take a deep breath, count to ten, and tackle each task one step at a time. ~Linda Shalaway
Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work. ~Peter Drucker.
The ability to honestly and quietly reflect on one’s life is one of the most powerful tools for personal growth. ~Richard Carlson
It is through cooperation, rather than conflict, that your greatest successes will be derived. ~Ralph Charell
I am the greatest, I said that even before I knew I was. ~Muhammad Ali
If you’ll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives. ~Vince Lombardi
To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance. ~Oscar Wilde
A superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions. ~Confucius
A ship is safe in harbour, but that’s not what ships are for. ~William Shedd
If you want your life to be more rewarding, you have to change the way you think. ~Oprah Winfrey
Happiness can be found in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
It requires less character to discover the faults of others, than to tolerate them. ~J. Petit Senn
The moment you’re ready to quit is usually the moment right before the miracle happens.
Innovation is about seeing what all see, but thinking like no one else thinks. Never get stuck in the everybody box. ~John Turk
Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else’s. ~Billy Wilder
However long the night, the dawn will break. ~African proverb
Imagination has no limits. The future is as bright as you sincerely imagine it to be. ~Ralph Marston
If you are surprised by the things I say and do, then you really have not paid attention to who I am. ~Tanya Masse
Life flows naturally in the direction of your choices. ~Lori Mitchell
Smile at strangers and you just might change a life. ~Steve Maraboli
A man should never be ashamed to own he has been wrong, which is but saying, that he is wiser today than he was yesterday. ~Alexander Pope
When life is sweet, say thank you and celebrate. When life is bitter, say thank you and grow.
The only thing that matters in life, is your own opinion about yourself. ~Osho
I believe in loyalty. When a woman reaches an age she likes, she should stick with it. ~Eva Gabor
